title: LEAGUE IS FILLED WITH WONDERFUL HARD WORKING AND VERY VERY SUPPORTIVE PLAYERS!!!!!!
body: LEAGUE OF LEGENDS IS FILLED WITH WONDERFUL HARD WORKING AND VERY VERY** SUPPORTIVE** PLAYERS!!!!!!

replies.body: Nothing is better than starting a losing game where you have 1-2 teammates feeding and every one ends up being great people that support the feeders without any toxicity/salt and you end up winning with everyone having a positive kda. God those games are actually the best
Yeah, Fire Emblem is fun, isn't it?

I know, right? One game, I was playing TT because I was bored, and since the enemy team had Sion and Xin Zhao, me, riven, and warwick fed them so hard. But warwick didn't really care, all of us were just like "wtf" and "what". Atleast I didn't get flamed on. But that sion and xin kept on saying "gg ez" {{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}
I agree, just had a game with a bunch of great people, all supportive even when garen was losing top lane
